document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich took the stand in his own defense on thursday morning in his corruption re-trial, smiling at jurors and telling tales of his boyhood.
document.title: rod blagojevich takes witness stand
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich took the stand in his own defense on thursday morning in his corruption re-trial, smiling at jurors and telling tales of his boyhood.
